subject: Writing HttpUnit tests
msgSnippet: Hi, For the latest release of LogWeb: http://www.codeczar.com/products/logweb/ I developed an extensive set of HttpUnit tests. A pattern evolved whilst
messageBody:
Hi,

For the latest release of LogWeb:
http://www.codeczar.com/products/logweb/ I developed an extensive set of
HttpUnit tests.

A pattern evolved whilst developing these tests. This may be of
interest to other people developing HttpUnit tests so I have documented
it here:
http://www.codeczar.com/technologies/httpunit/HttpUnitHowTo.html

This is very much a work in progress. following on from here I think
there is scope for:
1) developing a framework to formalise this process
2) automating the generation of the test classes

cheers
Nathan

--
Nathan Coast
Managing Director
codeczar ltd
